metadata.synopsis: As Mike (Michael Brandon) and Susan (Bonnie Bedelia) prepare to wed, the couple's families bring their own relationship troubles to the festivities. Susan's father, Hal (Gig Young), is having an affair, while her older sister, Wilma (Anne Meara), can't get her husband to pay attention to her emotional needs. Meanwhile, Mike's brother, Richie (Joseph Hindy), and his wife, Joan (Diane Keaton), are contemplating a divorce, to the horror of his parents (Bea Arthur, Richard Castellano).

reviews: One of the best movies ever made that centers around a wedding.
It has the tact to hold back, to trust its characters to somehow fumble through to something that's not love, maybe, but will do.
A witty movie - the success of which Howard never repeated.
